title: Oondamooroo: a profile of Ernie Dingo (A)
creator_contributor_role: Australia. Special Broadcasting Service, production company
viewing_guidelines: Aboriginal and Islander viewers should note this work may contain images of deceased people and caution should be exercised when viewing.
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Motion picture actors and actresses - Biography
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Biographical films
Music & Performing Arts/Motion picture actors and actresses - Biography
People/Motion picture actors and actresses - Biography
description: The Aboriginal actor Ernie Dingo talks about his career, his origins, influences on his life and his feelings about his aboriginality. Features excerpts from his work on stage and screen, interviews with friends, mentors, family and wife and shows him at work teaching Aboriginal children to develop self-respect and white children to understand Aboriginal culture and history. An engaging look at an impressive and likeable personality.
